text.en: Once per Chain, when a monster on the field activates its effect, except "Bunny Instruct-ear" (Quick Effect): You can place 1 Bunny Ears Counter on that monster. (Monsters with a Bunny Ears Counter cannot be destroyed by battle.) Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster with a Bunny Ears Counter; banish both it and this card until the Standby Phase of the next turn.
